snippet: Washington and Lee University said Tuesday it was removing Confederate battle flags from Lee Chapel on its Lexington campus and will continue to study its historical involvement with slavery.
abstract: Washington and Lee University announces that it will remove Confederate battle flags from Lee Chapel on its Lexington, Va, campus.
lead_paragraph: Washington and Lee University said Tuesday it was removing Confederate battle flags from Lee Chapel on its Lexington campus and will continue to study its historical involvement with slavery.

headline.main: Virginia: College Will Remove Confederate Flags
headline.print_headline: Virginia: College Will Remove Confederate Flags
